category: Herbs Regulate Qi Herbs that Invigorate the Blood

action.primary: Regulates Qi, invigorates the Blood, breaks up Blood Stasis, dispels Wind and eliminates toxins

indications: Stomach due to Liver Attacking the Stomach, amenorrhea, dystocia, cough, hemoptysis, traumatic injury, incised wounds, carcinoma

notes: This herb has been shown to inhibit the growth of cancer cells.
It calms the Liver and stops all types of pain caused by Liver Qi Stagnation.

Semen Cycadis Revolutae Su Die Zi is bitter, sour, neutral and toxic. It has astringent and emenogogic properties. I is used as an antitussive and expectorant. It aids digestion and treats diarrhea, cuts and traumatic injuries. Its dosage is 9-15g.
